news.title: Electric cars eligible for Â£3,750 discount announced
news.summary: The Puma Gen-E and e-Tourneo Courier are two Ford models drivers can purchase under the government scheme.

news.title: 'My friend got hit in the back': Witnesses describe terror of Minneapolis school shooting
news.summary: One young boy says he was protected from gunfire in a church by a friend who lay on top of him and was shot.

news.title: Reform council boss bans local newspaper's reporters
news.summary: The Nottingham Post describes the ban as "concerning" and "unprecedented".

news.title: Starmer to replace third top aide in less than a year
news.summary: Nin Pandit runs the PM's team in Downing Street and has only been in the role for ten months.

news.title: Epping hotel case could set precedent, court told
news.summary: Lawyers for The Bell Hotel owners are challenging the decision for a temporary injunction at court.

news.title: White House fires disease control director as other officials resign from health agency
news.summary: The White House removes Dr Susan Monarez from her job running the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

news.title: 'No class and no education' - how a row blew up between Ostapenko and Townsend at US Open
news.summary: Taylor Townsend says Jelena Ostapenko told her she has "no class" and "no education" after the American beat her in the US Open second round.

news.title: Xi shows Trump who holds the cards as he sets up meeting with Kim and Putin
news.summary: The leaders of North Korea and Russia will attend China's military parade next week - a win for Xi.

news.title: What we know about the Minneapolis Catholic school shooting
news.summary: Two children aged eight and 10 have been killed and 17 more people have been injured.

news.title: How Tokyo is using AI video to prepare for a Mt Fuji eruption
news.summary: Tokyo authorities say they released the AI-generated video to raise awareness and help people prepare for disaster - but how likely is Mt Fuji to actually erupt?
